mapper.sql: storehouse_positions_id AS "storehousePositionsId", storehouse_id AS "storehouseId", delivery_id AS "deliveryId",sku_id AS "skuId",delivery AS "delivery", customer_id AS "customerId",after_number AS "afterNumber",before_number AS "beforeNumber", outstock_listing_id AS "outstockListingId", time AS "time", number AS "number", price AS "price", brand_id AS "brandId", deptId AS "deptId", create_time AS "createTime", create_user AS "createUser", update_time AS "updateTime", update_user AS "updateUser", display AS "display", item_id AS "itemId", state AS "state", outstock_order_id AS "outstockOrderId", outstock_apply_id AS "outstockApplyId"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_erp_outstock_listing where 1 = 1 and display = 1
and outstock_listing_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.outstockListingId},'%')
and time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.time},'%')
and number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.number},'%')
and price like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.price},'%')
and brand_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.brandId},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and item_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.itemId},'%')
and state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.state},'%')
and outstock_order_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.outstockOrderId},'%')
and outstock_apply_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.outstockApplyId},'%')

select
from daoxin_erp_outstock_listing where 1 = 1 and display = 1
and outstock_listing_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.outstockListingId},'%')
and time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.time},'%')
and number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.number},'%')
and price like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.price},'%')
and brand_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.brandId},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and item_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.itemId},'%')
and state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.state},'%')
and outstock_order_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.outstockOrderId},'%')
and outstock_apply_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.outstockApplyId},'%')

select
from daoxin_erp_outstock_listing where 1 = 1 and display = 1
and outstock_listing_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.outstockListingId},'%')
and time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.time},'%')
and number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.number},'%')
and price like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.price},'%')
and brand_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.brandId},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and item_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.itemId},'%')
and state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.state},'%')
and outstock_order_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.outstockOrderId},'%')
and outstock_apply_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.outstockApplyId},'%')
and deptId = #{paramCondition.deptId} or deptId in ( select dept_id from sys_dept where pids like CONCAT('%$[', #{paramCondition.deptId}, '$]%') escape '$' ))

select
from daoxin_erp_outstock_listing where 1 = 1 and display = 1
and outstock_listing_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.outstockListingId},'%')
and time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.time},'%')
and number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.number},'%')
and price like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.price},'%')
and brand_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.brandId},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and item_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.itemId},'%')
and state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.state},'%')
and outstock_order_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.outstockOrderId},'%')
and outstock_apply_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.outstockApplyId},'%')

SELECT create_user AS "createUser", create_time AS "create_time", COUNT(outstock_order_id) AS "orderCount" FROM daoxin_erp_outstock_listing WHERE 1 = 1
and date_format(create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') >= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.beginTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') <= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.endTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')
GROUP BY create_user

SELECT create_user AS "createUser", create_time AS "create_time", COUNT(outstock_order_id) AS "orderCount", sum(number) AS "outNumCount" FROM daoxin_erp_outstock_listing WHERE 1 = 1
and date_format(create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') >= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.beginTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') <= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.endTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')
GROUP BY create_user,sku_id

SELECT table2.create_time AS "monthOfYear", sum(table2.orderCount) AS "orderCount" FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%Y-%m' ) AS "create_time", COUNT( outstock_order_id ) AS "orderCount" FROM daoxin_erp_outstock_listing WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY create_time ) table2 WHERE 1= 1
and date_format(create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') >= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.beginTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') <= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.endTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')
GROUP BY table2.create_time

SELECT count( DISTINCT sku_id ) AS "outSkuCount", sum(number) AS "outNumCount" FROM daoxin_erp_outstock_listing WHERE 1 = 1
and date_format(create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') >= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.beginTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') <= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.endTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')

SELECT class.`name` AS "spuClassName", count( DISTINCT list.sku_id ) AS "outSkuCount", sum( list.number ) AS "outNumCount" FROM daoxin_erp_outstock_listing list LEFT JOIN goods_sku sku ON list.sku_id = sku.sku_id LEFT JOIN goods_spu spu ON spu.spu_id = sku.spu_id LEFT JOIN goods_spu_class class ON spu.spu_classification_id = class.spu_classification_id WHERE 1 = 1
and date_format(create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') >= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.beginTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') <= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.endTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')
GROUP BY class.spu_classification_id

SELECT class.`spu_classification_id` AS "classId", list.`sku_id` AS "skuId", sum( list.number ) AS "outNumCount" FROM daoxin_erp_outstock_listing list LEFT JOIN goods_sku sku ON list.sku_id = sku.sku_id LEFT JOIN goods_spu spu ON spu.spu_id = sku.spu_id LEFT JOIN goods_spu_class class ON spu.spu_classification_id = class.spu_classification_id WHERE 1 = 1
and date_format(list.create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') >= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.beginTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(list.create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') <= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.endTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')
and class.spu_classification_id in
#{spuClassId}
GROUP BY class.spu_classification_id,list.sku_id

SELECT lists.type, count( DISTINCT list.sku_id ) AS "outSkuCount", sum( list.number ) AS "outNumCount" FROM daoxin_erp_outstock_listing list LEFT JOIN daoxin_erp_outstock_order outstock on list.outstock_order_id = outstock.outstock_order_id LEFT JOIN daoxin_production_pick_lists lists on lists.pick_lists_id = outstock.source_id WHERE 1 = 1
and date_format(create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') >= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.beginTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') <= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.endTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')
GROUP BY lists.type

SELECT storehouse.`name`, count( DISTINCT list.sku_id ) AS "outSkuCount", sum( list.number ) AS "outNumCount" FROM daoxin_erp_outstock_listing list
LEFT JOIN daoxin_erp_storehouse storehouse on list.storehouse_id = storehouse.storehouse_id WHERE 1 = 1
and date_format(create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') >= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.beginTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') <= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.endTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')
GROUP BY storehouse.storehouse_id

SELECT user.user_id AS "userId", count( DISTINCT list.sku_id ) AS "outSkuCount", sum( list.number ) AS "outNumCount" FROM daoxin_erp_outstock_listing list LEFT JOIN sys_user user ON list.create_user = user.user_id WHERE 1 = 1
and date_format(create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') >= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.beginTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') <= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.endTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')
GROUP BY user.user_id

SELECT customer.`customer_name` AS "customerName", count( DISTINCT list.sku_id ) AS "outSkuCount", sum( list.number ) AS "outNumCount" FROM daoxin_erp_outstock_listing list LEFT JOIN goods_inkind inkind ON list.inkind_id = inkind.inkind_id LEFT JOIN daoxin_crm_customer customer ON customer.customer_id = inkind.inkind_id WHERE 1 = 1
and date_format(create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') >= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.beginTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') <= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.endTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')
GROUP BY customer.customer_id ORDER BY count( DISTINCT list.sku_id ) DESC

SELECT customer.`customer_name` AS "customerName", count( DISTINCT list.sku_id ) AS "outSkuCount", sum( list.number ) AS "outNumCount" FROM daoxin_erp_outstock_listing list LEFT JOIN goods_inkind inkind ON list.inkind_id = inkind.inkind_id LEFT JOIN daoxin_crm_customer customer ON customer.customer_id = inkind.inkind_id WHERE 1 = 1
and date_format(create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') >= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.beginTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') <= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.endTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')
GROUP BY customer.customer_id ORDER BY sum( list.number ) DESC

SELECT list.sku_id AS "skuId", sum( list.number ) AS "number", list.create_time AS "createTime" FROM daoxin_erp_outstock_listing list LEFT JOIN daoxin_erp_outstock_order outstock on list.outstock_order_id = outstock.outstock_order_id LEFT JOIN daoxin_production_pick_lists lists on lists.pick_lists_id = outstock.source_id WHERE 1 = 1
and date_format(list.create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') >= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.beginTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(list.create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') <= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.endTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')
GROUP BY list.sku_id ORDER BY sum( list.number ) DESC
